initialPrompt: Hello, I'm here for a check-up. My lower denture has been bothering me.

responses.denture: Yes, it's quite loose. I got it about 5 years ago.
responses.pain: No real pain, just discomfort when chewing.
responses.medical: I have high blood pressure and take amlodipine.
responses.smoking: I quit smoking 2 years ago. I used to smoke a pack a day.
